description: It's finally time to make that old&nbsp;bottle of wine you've had lurking in your fridge for ages. Kirs are the absolute drink if there is any leftover at all, and they don't take too long or require many ingredients!Plus, you can make this simple cocktail with anything from&nbsp;red or white wine, so it will never get repetitive (not even when celebrating).
name: Kir
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Crème de cassis liqueur
5 oz. Dry white or red wine, chilled
